attributes.action: Charge Rotherham council, police and child protection services with conspiracy to commit rape
attributes.additional_details: Rotherham council, child protection department and police were fully aware and covered up the fact that a gang or gangs of men (irrespective of race) were systematically raping young girls, even renting them out for sex in other towns. As a father of 2 girls, I feel that criminal charges should be raised against all persons involved for aiding and abetting/ allowing these crimes to occur. Their actions are not just a failure in their duties, but a wilful and deliberate failure to stop the crimes, making them a party to such crimes.

rejection.details: The investigation of alleged crime is an operational policing matter.
